meanings.definition: A small flake of soot or dirt.
meanings.sent1: I wiped the smut off the window with a cloth.
meanings.sent2: The chimney sweep had to clean the smut from the fireplace.
meanings.sent3: The smut on my hands made it look like I had been playing in the dirt.
meanings.sent4: The smut on the car's exhaust pipe indicated a problem with the engine.
meanings.sent5: The smut on the ceiling was a reminder to clean the house regularly.

meanings.definition: Obscene or vulgar material, especially in literature or art.
meanings.sent1: The bookshop had a section dedicated to smutty novels.
meanings.sent2: The artist's controversial painting was accused of containing smut.
meanings.sent3: The comedian's jokes were full of smut that made the audience laugh.
meanings.sent4: The movie director decided to cut out the smut scenes to make the film suitable for all audiences.
meanings.sent5: The teacher warned the students against using smut in their creative writing assignments.
